name: Bluebell Fabric
description: A floral design created from both a watercolour sketch and photograph of bluebells, using a soft monochromatic palette. Suitable for loose covers, drapes and domestic upholstery* Composition: 80% Viscose 20% Linen. Repeat Size: V36cm H36cm* Pattern Match: Straight Width: 136cm* Use General Domestic Made in the UK. Samples can be ordered from our shop, order a sample of Bluebell here. * For upholstery we recommend using a fire retardant interliner. * Please allow a +/- 5% tolerance on all pattern repeats and widths given. * If you require this fabric as curtains or blinds, please email us. * Cut fabric cannot be returned. For additional inspiration please visit our inspiration gallery, or take a look at our most recent photography.

For additional inspiration please visit our inspiration gallery, or take a look at our most recent photography.

name: Summers Lease Fabric

Composition: 50% Linen 50% Cotton. Repeat Size: V51cm H44cm* Pattern Match: Straight Width: 137cm* Use General Domestic Made in the UK. name: Starling Grey Fabric
